page.title: 02Stefan's Day - Purley
page.content: Hello, my name is Stefan. I live in Purley. I wake up at about 7.00am and get changed into my school uniform. For breakfast I have cornflakes, egg, toast and a cup of coffee. At about 8.00am Dad and my sister go in the car to Croydon. He drops my sister off at her school and he goes to work. He is an insurance inspector. Jeffrey, my friend calls for me on the way to school. Three-quarters of the way there mum goes to work at playschool. Then we go to school. We do some maths and reading, then we have lunch. In the afternoon we do Art and Craft, sometimes singing and a story. We go home at 3.15pm. At home I play on my computer or watch T.V. My sister is home at 4.30pm and Dad at 6.00pm. We have supper at 6.00pm and I go to bed at 9.00pm. I like 1985.
